descriptions.title: An Overview of the Yakkha Region
descriptions.content: The Yakkha are a Rai ethnic group of eastern Nepal who speak a Tibeto-Burman language of the same name. According to the 2001 census of Nepal, 14,648 people speak Yakkha as a mother tongue and there are 17,003 ethnic Yakkha. (Mark Turin – June 01, 2004)
